message: everyone is laughing at the bullshit of """"alternative facts"""" and missing the point where she says essentially """"(if you guys won't report the way we want you to) we'll have to reevaluate our relationship with the press"""" hinting they will be cut off from access. there is no relationship. the press has a duty to reports fact whether you like it or not. they are under no obligation to further your spin or propaganda. they are not there to be your friend. now a professional, grown up would try to interact with them cordially instead of shouting them down, interrupting and heaping lie upon lie but if you can't manage that then you have no business interacting with them and should stick to a static press release.

Someone ask who gave the keys to a boat to 14 year olds bet that same person hands keys to a 15 years old. Some states you can get your drivers license at 15. All kids are not raise on electronics and locked up in a house. My kids could drive better than most adults. Truck, go-carts, lawn mowers, four wheelers, boats. Depends on where you live and how you were raised. In Florida water is a part of every day life for most kids. My kids were sailing sunfish at 6-7 years old. Have taken many cost guard classes. Are safer than most adults. By the way they can probably out shoot you too. I have a 19 year old going special forces after graduation. He can lay it down with an AK47. Hell yeh I encourage them to live life and enjoy themselves. Don't just be desk jockeys. My 17 year old boy was traveling the country with a band. Never had any drug problems or cop problems from any of the 6 of them. We are church going Christians. Corp owners. Upright, outstanding, community members. You just need your priorities in order and know what makes you happy.
